          <title>
            <string language="en">How acid acid rain is made from nitrogen oxides in car exhaust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie saurer saurer Regen von den Stickstoffoxiden 
im Autoabsaugventilator gebildet wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment des pluies acides acides sont faites à 
partir des oxydes d'azote en échappement de voiture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como a chuva ácida ácida é feita dos óxidos 
do nitrogênio na exaustão do carro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come la pioggia acida acida è fatta dagli ossidi
dell'azoto in scarico dell'automobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς η όξινη όξινη βροχή γίνεται από τα οξείδια 
αζώτου στην εξάτμιση αυτοκινήτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo la lluvia ácida ácida se hace de los 
óxidos del nitrógeno en extractor del coche</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram demonstrates the formation of acid rain from nitrogen oxides emitted by cars.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Anordnung des sauren 
Regens von den Stickstoffoxiden, die durch Autos ausgestrahlt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme démontre la formation des pluies

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama demonstra a formação da chuva

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema dimostra la formazione di pioggia

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα καταδεικνύει το σχηματισμό της

αυτοκίνητα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama demuestra la formación de la 
lluvia ácida de los óxidos del nitrógeno emitidos por los coches.</string>
